author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom sink shutoff valve tips…I’m using a 1/2 inch by 3/8 inch SharkBite compression angle stop. I cut the copper stub out then deburr the inside and outside. I shop vac the pipe to ensure none of the burrs clog the faucet and place the nut on the copper followed by the ferrule and angle stop. After I hand-tighten the nut, I use the Ridgid angle stop wrenches to tighten it another 1/2 turn and test for leaks. For more written tips and full video tutorials visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Sink Shutoff Valve Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
